body_html:
Thanks @fmassa for the pointers. I got the functionality exposed.

@SsnL I could need your help. As mentioned I managed to access the functionality. But nothing happens if I call it (GPU memory is still allocated by the python process).

Here are my changes: tibuch@946eab3

Once it runs I will file a PR :)

body:
Thanks @fmassa for the pointers. I got the functionality exposed.

@SsnL I could need your help. As mentioned I managed to access the functionality. But nothing happens if I call it (GPU memory is still allocated by the python process).

Here are my changes: https://github.com/tibuch/pytorch/commit/946eab341fa22798d7b961f83951a51bc46b0cc9

Once it runs I will file a PR :)
